It is located at Hollywood & Highland plaza. The easiest way to find them, take the escalator next to TCL Chinese Theater to 3rd floor  The Service: Staff is very friendly and efficient.  The Food: Fresh ingredients and every item you …
Choosing Burrata House for lunch is the best decision for cheese lovers. Delicious menu, I tried their Turkey Sandwich and was the perfect combination by far in Los Angeles.

Definitely my new favorite spot! It’s healthy and delicious. Great place for a quick bite & very friendly staff who will guide you through the menu. Their pasta with Burrata & Bolognese is next level :) I cannot wait to try more of their food!
Favorite Place in LA! Great Food and Great  Service!
